com.yotako.customView.YotakoTextView.android:text: Traditional Classics for the New You

WORLD CONTEMPORARY
An Amalgamation of Tradition and Exclusiveness

BEAUTIFUL SOUTH
An Amalgamation of Tradition and Exclusiveness

ALL TIME CLASSICS
Harmonious Interplay of Fancy Shape Diamonds and Substantial Sizes
we invite you to visit our store
C.P Ramaswamy Road, (Next to Airtel Store) Abhiramapuram, Chennai Tel : 044 4300 9111

This beautiful , feminine jewel is studded with 3.72 carats of diamonds along with semi precious green stones. They are made as light as possible to swish and sway in a manner complementing a woman’s movement .
Our Beautiful South collection is inspired by heritage South Indian style jewellery and comprises a range of Pendants , Jhumkas , Necklaces and Haarams.

Established in the year 2003, we have dedicated ourselves in creating a reputation for excellence and creative jewellery designs.We are committed to offering the very best in quality , as all our diamonds are Certified VVS EF by International Gemmological Labs and BIS Hallmarked. Our motto is to offer the best value to our customers , by personally sourcing the most beautiful diamonds and manufacturing fine diamond jewellery in-house.
